<traits>

<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Nonlethal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=188" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 396 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Pain](/Domains.aspx?ID=24)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** A creature in range damages you.

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** the triggering creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude

</row>

</column>

---

You vengefully reflect your pain upon your tormentor. The target takes mental damage equal to half the amount it dealt to you when it triggered the spell.
name: Retributive Pain
